item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-02-16
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Zaftig's Delicatessen (335 Harvard St, Brookline). #
  • Florida family gives up on small-town North Dakota - there are some great quotes in that article. #
  • creepy RT @SamSifton: Conde Nast tells @Barry_Estabrook to pull his Gourmet pieces from his own blog. . (via @ruhlman) #
  • RT: Raising money for StackOverflow (via @justinvincent) #
  • Simon eyes Faneuil Hall Marketplace, other malls - Daily Business Update - The Boston Globe via @sharethis #

Powered by Twitter Tools
